thread.title: BRIEF-Finisar Reports Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.20

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Finisar Reports Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.20
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Finisar Corp:
* FINISAR ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q4 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.09 TO $0.15
* SEES Q4 2018 REVENUE $300 MILLION TO $320 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE $332.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $333.2 MILLION
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23, REVENUE VIEW $333.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $333.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
